correct_order: In the lecture, you should be a good listener.
To be a good listener, you should take notes.
This make you memorize, for these you take note, and should construct sentences.
After that, this would help you in revising and exercising key words.

sources: This make you memorize, for these you take note, and should construct sentences.
To be a good listener, you should take notes.
After that, this would help you in revising and exercising key words.
In the lecture, you should be a good listener.
